comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content: Hi crzyone9584, The Chandra Xray Observatory is a telescope which detects xray emissions. Different color values are assigned to the data Chandra collects, creating the images. You can learn more about it here - chandra.harvard.edu/about/ Best, Effie, Smithsonian Institution Archives
